stages.title: Silver Tip
keyIndicators: Buds swell and show a silvery sheen.

idealConditions.climate: Cool, moist conditions favor healthy bud development.

fertilizationRequirements: Minimal fertilization needed at this stage.
Apply balanced nutrients if soil tests indicate deficiency.
yieldImpactFactors: Sudden frost can damage buds and delay growth.
Excessive rain may encourage fungal diseases.
description: The first visible sign of growth after winter dormancy.
Buds swell slightly and develop a silvery sheen at the tip.
careTips: Apply dormant oil sprays to eliminate overwintering pests.
Start monitoring for early-season fungal infections like apple scab.
